meanings.definition: The act of flirting or engaging in flirtatious behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her flirtations with the waiter were obvious to everyone in the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends enjoyed the light flirtations at the party.
meanings.sent3: During the game of charades, his flirtations with guessing the answers made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The flirtations of the wind with the leaves created a gentle rustling sound.
meanings.sent5: The flirtations between the two birds in the garden were a delightful sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A series of flirtatious actions or gestures.
meanings.sent1: The flirtations between the two dancers on stage were captivating.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the subtle flirtations between her classmates during the group project.
meanings.sent3: The flirtations of the cat with the toy mouse provided entertainment for the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The flirtations of colors in the painting created a vibrant and lively composition.
meanings.sent5: The flirtations of the waves with the shore painted a serene picture by the beach.
